Texts.Chs: 现在，你可以随心所欲地在星系间漫游。一旦我有更多的细节与你分享，我会再次与你联系。祝你好运，大使，一路顺风。
Texts.Eng: For now, you are free to roam the galaxy as you will. Once I have more details to share with you, I will contact you again. Good luck out there, ambassador, and be careful.

Texts.Chs: 我将很快会见联盟的其他领导人，以便我们能够充分讨论这一悲剧。我们还将讨论你们的下一个任务是什么。
Texts.Eng: I will meet with the other leaders of the Alliance soon, so we can discuss this tragedy in full. We will also discuss what your next assignment will be.

Texts.Chs: 很高兴看到你一切都好，大使。我从其他一些逃出来的大使那里得知了地球和守护团的毁灭，我担心你可能已经在混乱中丧生了。
Texts.Eng: It is good to see that you are well, ambassador. I learned about the destruction of Earth and the Protectorate through some of the other ambassadors who escaped, and I had feared you might have perished in the chaos.
